News.Title: Tejas Cargo India Reports 45% Jump in H1 Net Profit Despite Margin Compression
News.Summary: Tejas Cargo India delivered strong H1 results with net profit surging to 126 million rupees from 87 million rupees year-over-year, driven by revenue growth to 3 billion rupees from 2.5 billion rupees. Despite revenue expansion, EBITDA margin compressed to 14.37% from 17.05% while absolute EBITDA remained flat at 433 million rupees versus 431 million rupees.

News.Title: Tejas Cargo: Flat Debut Expected on BSE SME Platform
News.Summary: Tejas Cargo shares are set to debut on the BSE SME platform with no grey market premium, suggesting a flat listing. The IPO raised Rs 106 crore with a 1x subscription rate. The company, specializing in Full Truck Load services, plans to use the funds for fleet expansion and working capital.
